title: Comparing obj1 and obj2 object references

content.question: Assume obj1 and obj2 are object references. Which of the following best describes when the expression obj1 == obj2 is true?

choices.label: When obj1 and obj2 are defined within the same method
When obj1 and obj2 are instances of the same class
When obj1 and obj2 refer to objects that contain the same data
When obj1 and obj2 refer to the same object

content.answer: When obj1 and obj2 refer to the same object

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
